name: Hierarchy Pages Nav
author: enomoto@celtislab

sections.description:
Document hierarchy pages like a book and provide easy navigation between pages.

Documentation

Used library

jquery.mjs.nestedSortable.js https://github.com/ilikenwf/nestedSortable　 MIT license
sections.installation:
1. Upload the hierarchy-pages-nav folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open the setting menu, it is possible to set the execution condition.
